description:
[Piano lesson] Accelerate Your Keyboard Playing in Blues, Rock and Funk (Berklee School) videoshkoly keyboards  piano (mpg + pdf)


[Piano lesson] Accelerate Your Keyboard Playing in Blues, Rock and Funk (Berklee School)

Genre : videoshkoly (keyboards - piano) Duration : 45 min. Description : [Piano lesson] Accelerate Your Keyboard Playing in Blues, Rock and Funk (Berklee School ) - DVDRip (mpg + PDF) As Performed by Dave Limina. Exercises and Tips to Make You Better - Faster. Videos. Contains tablature. 


Berklee Professor Dave Limina has Carefully Chosen for each exercise this video to help keyboardists Build Their harmonic, melodic and rhythmic Vocabulary in Blues, Rock, Funk and Jazz styles. Features easy-to-follow exercises and demonstrations on: scales and blues techniques; ear training; rock and blues phrasing; two-hand grooves for funk, Texas, shuffle, roots-rock and Latin styles; and jazz voicings and rhythms. Includes an 88-page booklet. Biography of the author http://www.berklee.edu/faculty/detail/david-limina 


Quality : DVDRip Format : MPEG Video: MPEG1 Video 352x240 (107:80) 29.97fps 2000Kbps Audio: MPEG Audio 44100Hz stereo 256Kbps
